achievements: Composed the soundtracks for many David Lynch films including Twin Peaks and Blue Velvet.
Won a Grammy Award for his work on the Twin Peaks soundtrack.
Trained world champion boxers such as Muhammad Ali, Sugar Ray Leonard and George Foreman.
Inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.
Known for his progressive views and efforts to modernize the Catholic Church.
Convened the Second Vatican Council, a pivotal event in Catholic history.
